website_summaries.verdict: Powerful LED grill lights that are magnetic, easy to use, and include batteries. However, keep in mind that magnets might not stick to stainless steel grills.
pros: Magnetic grill lights are bright enough to illuminate your grill surface and cook space
Flexible gooseneck design is easy to adjust
Owners have found the lights useful for multiple purposes
cons: Magnets don't provide a strong connection on all magnetic surfaces and may not stick to all stainless steel grills
Consider checking your gill with a magnet before purchase

customer_reviews.title: Great value...exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We had a larger LED grill light in the past that was a "clamp" attached one. It was tough to position and was always in the way when you opened/shut the grill cover. These little beauties are exactly what we needed. They are small, magnetic, and feel sturdy. With the magnets, we can affix one on each side of the grill and it gives us all of the light we need. Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: These were not my first choice, but when my original grill light, which was ADVERTISED as ‘heat resistant’ plastic, began to melt when attached to the grill as the instructions specified, I switched it up. So glad I chose these. The magnetic base allows me to place the lights wherever I need them, and the gooseneck design gives me ultimate adjustability. It even came with a nice storage box. Very happy with my purchase. Don’t make the mistake I made . Buy these first and leave the plastic ones alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light.  Super pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new grill and needed some decent lighting since most of my meals are done at night. These 2 lights attach only to the lid of my grill because the side tables aren’t magnetic but the flex necks make the lighting very versatile. The light is bright and illuminates the grill well. The color of the light is good too. Im very pleased so far. Seems durable. I plan on keeping it in its storage when not in use and hope to get plenty of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had had it with the type of lights that snap on/connect to the handle of my Weber Genesis and was looking for something more versatile. This product met my expectations and provides enough light to perform a major surgery. Magnets are strong and the ability to direct the light where I need it most is invaluable. The fact they came with batteries is a big bonus. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One has died due to corrosion
customer_reviews.text: I keep mine outside unless it's going to rain, so they have stayed dry. One of the provided batteries leaked, corroding a contact. I've tried to sand down the corrosion, but have not been very successful. As such, the unit only puts out about 10-20% light. It's past the return deadline for Amazon, so I did a search of the company itself. Kosin appears to be a multi-national company, and I could not find a contact point to inquire about replacements. They do have a Facebook page, but it appears to be in Chinese. If you buy this light, please put in quality batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Walters

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and adjustable light
customer_reviews.text: This little light is very powerful. In the light department and the magnet department. I got this because my husband has a tendency to think he has more time than he does on any given project. Which has led us to grill in the dark on many occasions. I was very pleased to find other people had similar problems and that this product existed. The light seems bright even though it's only running on 3 AAAs. I havent had a chance to test out the durability and longevity of these lights yet, but I will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Fantastic magnetic light! Just what I needed for nighttime grilling.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was super excited when I opened this package. The plastic case is fantastic and makes storage very easy. The lights are very bright. I actually only need to use one on my large Weber grill. Keeping the second as a backup at the moment. Very well done light product for the price point. Wonderful product. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RPrall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, I was concerned that I had been duped as it was so tiny. I was expecting a huge grill light. However, I am very pleasantly surprised! What a great item! Perfect compact size, extremely bright, great magnet, nice carry case. Will be just want I wanted for camping. Will also be great for electric outages or needing a bright light in difficult spaces. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Relieved to No Longer Be Grilling the the Dark
customer_reviews.text: These lights are versatile and have many uses. I got them for my barbecue, but they can be used for reading, working on crafts, or anytime you need a small, bright light. Even with the outdoor light on, I still need light on the barbecue surface to see what I'm grilling. One last charred meal drive me to purchase lights. Sturdy and well-made, they have strong magnets that attach to the stainless steel barbecue. And they come with batteries. I have found that the two lights evenly illuminate the grill surface.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Marm

customer_reviews.title: Great grill lights!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these lights are small enough to go on handle so I can actually see when grilling this time of year. It gets dark so early I used to hate grilling in fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B

customer_reviews.title: Bright light beam you can see food at night. Strong magnet base!
customer_reviews.text: Note on the review page, the star section, asked me if they are waterproof well? I don't know and also at asked me if there were heat resistant once again I couldn't test that. They Market these as grill lights. But the lights are great as far as brightness was concerned it's throes the beam kind of like a flashlight does as far as distance goes it's not a flood lights more like a spotlight. Magnet base nice and strong I doubt that they are heat resistant because of the plastic. Nonetheless these are cool lights and they come in a really neat little case
customer_reviews.author: joe c.

customer_reviews.title: Super magnet for BBQing in the Dark
customer_reviews.text: The magnets on these LED lights are super strong. The super bright LEDs on the lights are perfect for BBQing at night. We always find ourselves bumbling along with our iPhone flashlights and now we long need to. I thought the two pack was perfect because I was thinking one would not be enough, but actually one is more than enough as the lights are super bright. So now I have a light for the smoker and for the propane grill. These lights also come with a super cool plastic padded case for storage or traveling. I would purchase again for sure. I might actually buy more for family and friends for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: C Raff

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: Got these lights yesterday and used them last night. Very bright, stable and you can aim them just where you want. I wish the base wasn't so tall, but that's a small gripe for the overall good features. It also rained last night. The grill is not protected from weather. I left them out there on purpose to make sure they were weatherproof so I could return them before the return period passed. Went out there and turned them on this morning and they are working great. Doesn't look like any water got into anything. So far so great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Literal

customer_reviews.title: Great little lights
customer_reviews.text: These put out a lot of light. See pic. They are perfect for cooking in the dark. For the price these are great. Lots of light, magnetic base, and flexible neck to point it wherever you need it. Wasn't expecting a storage case which, although a little chintzy, is a nice touch. I was also expecting them to be a little bigger, but that's my fault as I didn't read the dimensions in the description. I probably won't ever test just how weather proof they are as they will be put away every time or under my grill cover, and if it's going to rain, I throw up a canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Tobey D. Beagle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an electrician and my husband kept begging me to add another receptacle in the backyard, because the lights I installed on the house didn't light the grill area. Instead I brought these lights for him and immediately shut him up. He loves them. They are super bright, adjustable, have a magnet so they stay put and have a cute hardcover case. I understand they are water proof but we don't leave them out when not in use. Instead we place them back in their hardcover case and place them in the storage under our grill. This is a great buy, well worth the small price.
customer_reviews.author: adia

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Light!
customer_reviews.text: My search for the best grill light is finally over! I've tried several, and have been disappointed until now. This grill light is exactly what I needed! The two gooseneck lights are nice and bright, and work great on my Brinkmann Pitmaster. I can't use a handle mounted light on this grill because of the angle of the lid when it's open, and most goosenecks are either not bright enough, or don't have a good mount. This one solves my problems. Life is good, and I'll be grilling all winter with these lights. Oh, the case they come in is a cool bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Handsfree anywhere a bright light is needed.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my grill lights, and I'm very impressed. I'm surprised as to how bright they are. The magnet is very strong and does not allow my light to move when I'm adjusting it. These are very versatile also and can be used almost anywhere, not just for the grill. It's some of the little things that impress me also, such as batteries are included and there is a case to store the lights in. I'm very pleased with my selection of this product. I can't find any negative things to say about it and I would highly recommend them to anyone needing handsfree lighting.
customer_reviews.author: GaryK

customer_reviews.title: KOSIN Barbecue Grill Light Magnetic Base Super-Bright LED BBQ - 36
customer_reviews.text: Light are well made and the magnet is heavy duty. They stick very well on any metal surface. The lights are very bright and they show the food I am grilling at night.
customer_reviews.author: Hemied

customer_reviews.title: Lights up my grill. No more BBQ in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that you can just stick it to the grill cover and position it perfectly for your needs. It solved my issue where grilling at night required a flash light in one had. The lights are plenty bright, and nice that they came with batteries. One word of caution. When the lights are stuck to the grill, they will become very hot. They are made of metal obviously, as they would melt if not. They get really hot from the heat of the grill, so handle with care.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Two Lamps, Works very well
customer_reviews.text: These lights can be magnetically attached to the grill in any position that works for what you are grilling. They have flexible necks and can be adjusted to any position for the portion of the grill surface you are using. They store easily in a hard plastic case that seems to be a safe storage place under the grill when not in use. I have had several Weber brand lights over the years that attach to the grill handle. These are much more useful in that you can place them where needed and adjust the direction of the light. And there are two of them which increases the light.
customer_reviews.author: OregonWill

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous bang for the buck. Very well built, really bright light, strong anchoring magnets, can be placed anywhere on your grill for maximum coverage. They would do in a pinch as a flashlight during a power outage; would also be great when doing repairs around the house, working on your car, etc. They even come with a nice padded case so you can keep them together in your grill storage compartment. I'm going to check into this merchant to see what other stuff they offer; very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Baez

customer_reviews.title: Comes on tactical packaging but works great!
customer_reviews.text: The item is smaller then I expected but works great!!! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the packaging. As u see in the picture on initial glance it looks like it is a gun part. My problem is my husband buys alot of parts through amazon so when I opened I gave it to him because I thought it was a gun part he ordered. He opens and then starts asking what are these....of course these were suppose to be a gift and now the gift is ruined simply because the packaging does not display what it is. Only a small white tag on the back says grill lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I got these lights for my husband for Christmas and I was worried that he would not like them. I was wrong he LOVED them. So much so he bought some for our friends. The first time my husband we used the lights we had friends over for dinner. By the end of the evening we had purchased a second set for our friends as a surprise. The friend kept asking me to send him the link so he could purchase them. So they were definitely a hit for two men in my life. They are bright, easy to adjust, and the magnet is great for positioning.
customer_reviews.author: Haley S

customer_reviews.title: One Did Not Work, But Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: One of two does not work. I tried all the normal troubleshooting techniques: replacing the battery pack into the working one (it works), replacing the included batteries, trying various nudges on the switch, and so forth. Nope: it is DOA. Too much hassle to return -- the one that works is great, though. Edit 3-11-2020: the vendor very quickly reached out to me to offer a refund. That's good customer service -- and, because the one that works (as noted above) is great, I've updated the overall rating to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Flaven

customer_reviews.title: VERY Small Lights OK Brightness Limited Ways to Attach to Grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice, "cute" little lights. I was surprised at how small these lights actually are - smaller than they seem in pics. Brightness was ok - adequate, for their small size. Unfortunately I could not find ANY area on my Weber Summit stainless (yes, I know - normally high quality stainless = not magnetic) grill the lights' magnetic base would adhere to. Returned them for that reason. Additional included grill attachment options would be a smart addition to this item - especially for the high price. For what these lights are - WAY OVER-PRICED.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Traeger Grill!
customer_reviews.text: The magnets on these little lights are super strong and stick on my Traeger grill anywhere I put them. The lights are very bright! I put one on top and one on the side both pointed to the grill and it lights up like daylight! These lights can be used for other projects too and will stick anywhere a regular refrigerator magnet sticks. They bend and point however you need and are small but mighty! Came in a nice case to store them and take with us camping or to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment that didn't have great lighting over the range. Luckily my fridge is right next to it so having magnet LEDs was the perfect find. Damage free walls and they don't look terrible. The product is smaller then I imagined which is good thing because they are more discreet but still have great brightness. The magnet is very strong and it's great that you can you move and direct the light so easily. Bad lighting in the kitchen is solved!
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine

customer_reviews.title: Great value, useful product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights for my husband after he was complaining how difficult it was to BBQ in the dark. They are just perfect to illuminate the grill surface area, so now we're both happy...no more underdone meat :) The lights arrived promptly with Amazon prime, and I was impressed with the sturdy case and foam packing that enclosed the lights. Just pop in the enclosed batteries, and stick the magnetic bottom on the grill. My husband says they look like an alien's antennae lighting things up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Effective - Strong - Love it
customer_reviews.text: The light is very effective. Magnet is strong yet the unit is light. Our lights went out and I put this on my fridge. It helped me light up the kitchen so I could do my dishes! Love that it sticks to any magnetic surface and you can adjust where you need the light. Very versatile. I personally will not put it on my grill cover as it get too hot. But I happen to have a magnetic fence pole right next to the grill so the lighting is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product since I tend to use my grill during the winter season (So. California) and it gets dark pretty early. I have a grill in which is made from metal must say these came in handy as they are magnetic and pretty bright. Not an issue since obviously it will be place in a hot surface; the product does tend to get a bit hot not to the point where you get burns. Even thou they got pretty warm they still performed and still performing after a month later.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These grill lights work exactly as expected! Great light brightness, really strong magnetic hold, and good neck flexibility to shine light wherever needed. The main body of the light does get pretty warm when they're sitting on a lit grill, but not so hot that you can't handle it. I also didn't think I'd need two grill lights, but now I'm so glad I have them both and that this was a pack of two! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Bright BBQ light
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very bright light, flexible neck, easy to use. My BBQ is stainless steel which is not magnetic so the magnetic base doesn't 'stick' to my BBQ, but that is not the fault of the product. Definitely "sticks" to magnetic surfaces though! Very handy. UPDATE: 10.12.20 - when not attached to a magnetic surface, can be a little wobbly...feels a bit top-heavy perhaps? I still like this product though.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Must-have grill accessories
customer_reviews.text: This Grill Light is life-safer! Yes, you can use your phone light, but you can use only one hand. Also, you can drop the phone in the grill, and that’s it. This light with magnetic base is an unbelievable must-have thing. No need to remove it whenever you open/close the grill while cooking. I’m happy that you found it. Plus, it goes in a heavy-duty case. So, you always know where to put the lights during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Filipp N

customer_reviews.title: Lights work great in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I grill all the time, during winter and at night. I was glad to find the Kosin BBQ Grill light. The magnet is strong and adhere's to all parts of my grill. I place it on the side burner on the left and if I'm using both sides of the grill, I use the second light on the shelf on the right. The flexible handle makes them easy to angle right on your grill. I don't plan to leave them out, because they come in a great case to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tadros

customer_reviews.title: Great little light!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have these lights for my visually impaired husband. The lights arrived quickly! Much to my surprise, they came packaged in a nice little plastic box with foam padding to store the lights in when not in use. The magnet is super strong, and the light is bright. The product was smaller than I anticipated, but that actually works to my advantage! I’ll update if I have any issues with the lights in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Lights with a Convenient Storage Case - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These grill lights are great! They come in a hard protective case with foam lining and are individually packed in bubble wrap bags. It's nice that they come with AAA batteries, so you can start using them immediately without searching for batteries. The magnets are truly very strong and the lights are bright. I use them on the side of my grill and magnetically attach them the the side area of my grill near the temp dials. The lights are heat resistant and I haven't encountered any issues with the heat from the grill at all. They are extremely bright lights and let me grill at night and clearly see my food. An excellent product and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Wheatie-ATL

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to see what I'm grilling!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. They are easily set up and the magnet works great. I just attach it to the side of the grill with the gas controls and aim them where I need them. For the price, the can't be beat! No more grilling in the dark for me :-). I think these are way more useful than a handle mounted light. They do not get in the way at all and can be removed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Jarvah

customer_reviews.title: Do not leave on you're grill while grilling!
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets hot if you leave it on the grill while you're grilling. I turned on my grill and positioned the lights so all I had to do was turn them on while grilling. Came back out to put the meat on, opened the grill and tried to turn the light on. Ouch! Had to use my grill tongs to take them off! I'm keeping these because I hate returning stuff, but will look for other ones that don't radiate heat as much as this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Roddy Style

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought these for my husband to use for grilling, they work perfect! Good amount of broad light, strong magnet and very durable. However, we've also found that we love them for taking the dogs out at night! We keep one attached to the side of the refrigerator and grab it at night when letting the dogs out. The light is bright enough to light a path, but not too strong to disturb the neighbors - we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for outdoor lighting
customer_reviews.text: Our grill area lacks outdoor lighting and the KOSIN Barbecue Grill Light Magnetic Base Super-Bright LED BBQ Lights have resolved that problem. Although they are too short for our grill, we have a metal toolbox that is about 1 inch high that we do not use. We place the lights on that; the magnetic lights adhere firmly and are a satisfactory height for our large grill. The case that it comes in is well made. I can also use the lights in family room when extra lighting is needed for reading a book.
customer_reviews.author: kat947bike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Just What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: We have one light on our patio deck and it's right outside the door. It does not give much light to the cooking area. I like that these are magnetized and have a case so I remove them and take them inside after use. Careful though...they do collect some heat. They give off lots of light and I love, love, love that they are movable. So you can easily direct light where you want it. Don't hesitate on this one.
customer_reviews.author: PinkSugar

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet, bright lamp
customer_reviews.text: Used this to grill out last night, now that the sun sets at 5pm, and it was invaluable. I just stuck one on both of the side shelves of my grill and aimed them at the grill surface. The magnet is strong, so it's not going anywhere, and the light is nice and bright - I could definitely see what I was doing. The nice part is how versatile these things are; I bought them for my grill, but I can think of tons of other uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: E. F. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet and Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I especially like the case they come in. I can put them away and store them under my grill when I'm not using them. The magnet is strong enough I'm not worries about them falling off when I open the lid or anything like that. Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! We have used them for so many things aside from grilling. They magnetize to all metal surfaces. We have left them on the outside of the grill while the grill was hot the whole time and has no issues with leaving them in the hood. They are Definitely weather resistant, maybe weather-proof but I’d rather not test it. We just store ours under the grill in the inside wall, why risk it? Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill Lights
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these lights for my grill and I absolutely love them. They provide more than an adequate amount of lighting for seeing the status of food at night. I do a lot pf Smoking and grilling so sometimes I need to put meat on early in the mornings to smoke all day and they are very good for that application so you can see what you are doing when daylight is not available. Well worth the price, I highly recommend ordering a set.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: We found multi-purposes for these lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. They also look very expensive! We don't use our grill much after dark so we put one on our grandson's desk to enable him to see his beautiful pencil drawings and avoid mistakes. My husband has a wood workshop and uses one in the shop for seeing his lines on the wood, while hands-free, using his miter saw, etc. The two areas have plenty of metal around for the magnetic base to cling to. So they are multi-purpose lights besides looking good!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Strong and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I love how strong the magnet is. It sticks well to the refrigerator and doesn’t slowly slide down like some of the other heavier lights. I bought these as a gift for my father in law. He often winds up grilling after dark and the meat has been rather undercooked lately. I think these lights will be a perfect addition to his new grill and the meat will no longer be undercooked.
customer_reviews.author: S. Maguigan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, bright lights, & worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few weeks now and they are working great. Brightness was as expected. Just enough to see an entire grill of food in the middle of night. The body of the flashlight seems to be pretty durable. It comes in a pretty nice case that seems a bit unnecessary but what the heck. It was well worth the money for these. I have paid much more for lights that fee half as durable and last a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly The Right Size And Brightness
customer_reviews.text: We like to grill year-round, and now that the sun is setting earlier, these lights are exactly what I need. They stick anywhere I need them on the grill to see what I'm doing, and even though I could leave them out, they store easily inside. Nice bright LED lights; and also, they are shipped and store nicely in a padded plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rheins

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a quality purchase! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, feels well made and the lights are very bright. Multi positional lamp neck and having two lights really enables you to cover a large surface area of the grill with a lot of light. As well, keeping them in the kitchen magnetically attached to the fridge ensures they are out of the elements and are available in case of a blackout. I really appreciate the solid feel, I think these are going to last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT item to have if you smoke meat into the evening
customer_reviews.text: Affixes great to my Treager Smoker. I have no light where I smoke so I literally had to hold a flashlight in my teeth. I highly recommend this item. The black goes perfect with my Treager and I put them on the external rack that hangs in front and the magnets allow for me to angle the light PERFECTLY. For the price, you'd be stupid not to purchase this item. I plan on purchasing a couple more for gifts. BTW, works GREAT on a car fender when under the hood and we will use them on our boat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jared C. Karstetter, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I ordered them that the metal stainless BBQ is not magnetic. My husband is going to mount a strip to the BBQ the lights will stick to. In the meantime, I am thoroughly enjoying using the lights as little flashlights - they're very bright and handy to find as they do stick to my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: D Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: if you grill at night these are a must have.
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. They are adjustable so that you can put the light right where you need it. The magnetic base in each light allows you to stick them anyplace you like on your grill. I have used them about five times since I purchased them and I am so happy every time I use them. It has made grilling at night so much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: These lights are magnetic, to attach to the grill and they are BRIGHT. At our house, we are night shifters, so we are never really grilling during the daytime and our back porch light isn't bright enough to light up the grill. These solve that problem perfectly. I'm only sorry we haven't had these before now!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: BBQ lights for any grillers...Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. I have minimal lighting at night at my built in grill. These are sturdy, comes with a hard case carrying box, are built with great durability, has batteries that go into a chamber which you can keep separate so that it doesn’t corroded in your BBQ led light chamber, and the magnetic backing home wells onto your grill. Look no further as they of are great pricing and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Lam

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend and will be buying more for others!
customer_reviews.text: Okay for real let me just say, powerful magnet, bright bright light and not soo big that it's in the way or inconvenient. Its perfect specially since we cook alot of things that take hours so my husband will be able to see very clearly also . He uses it for others things as well. All in all just a great light .!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Kott

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality / Great Storage Box
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at this product. I expected a cheap version of a grill light for the price but what I received was top quality and packaged in a great box for long term storage! I have to say I am really surprised the price is not 2-3 times more considering the quality and packaging for storage. Thank you for putting out a great product that I will use for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good grill lights
customer_reviews.text: I've used magnetic grill lights before. The magnets on these are not as strong as my last one. It turns out my stainless steel grill is really aluminum, so I can only mount these magnetically to the grill hood. The goose neck isn't quite long enough to reach around the handle and shine on the grates without positioning the lights right at the edge of the hood.
customer_reviews.author: dberman

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says it does!
customer_reviews.text: First day I got it I couldn't wait to use it and they worked perfect! Put them on the lower part of my gas grill lid and it lit it up like a football stadium at night. Better then holding my phone in one hand with the flash on or a small flashlight in my mouth. Both hands are free. I had my gas grill going at 400 degrees and they stayed on the whole 20 minutes of cooking. Powerful magnets kept them in place will opening and closing the lid. Easy on and off push button. I would recommend this for any night time grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these grill lights and am extremely impressed. They're small (not bulky) and put off a large amount of light. They light my grill up better than the natural sun. Having a magnetic base and flexible head makes things that much better and easier. They also include batteries which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Impressive grill lamps, gray price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive set of grill lights. The lamps are really bright and the magnet is relatively strong. I also love the added addition of the case. I didn't see the case in the description of the newer version. I really do highly recommend these magnetic grill lights!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Curran

customer_reviews.title: Winter grilling with light!
customer_reviews.text: These two lights are great for the 6pm grilling that starts and ends in the dark during the winter! Magnet bottoms with goose neck tops lets you put the light where you want it. I use both of them when I have my large smoker going. If you put one on each end you have enough light to work without having to pull out a flash light.
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as part of a Father’s Day gift for my husband. He was stoked to receive these grill lights because he didn’t know they existed! He tried them right away, only to discover a spring was missing in the battery compartment of one of the lights. I reached out to Steven and asked for a spring...he sent us a whole new set! These lights are awesome because you can place them anywhere on the grill to give you good lighting while grilling. The gooseneck is sturdy, and helps you direct the light wherever you need it, unlike a few lights I’ve seen on amazon. Great experience so far with this product, and a fantastic seller! Thanks Steven!
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has told me this is the best gift I ever got him. Such a game changer for night grilling ... and now I don't have to stand there holding my phone to shine light!
customer_reviews.author: Katelin M.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value, these lights are bright and very well built for their price.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the these lights, they are inexpensive, well built, bright, the magnetic base is strong, even comes with batteries (the batteries are cheap but hey at this price I was surprised it came with them). The carrying case is a nice bonus, when I take these camping I wont have to worry about protecting them in a packed car trunk. I am sure I will many uses for these besides just grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Lights
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty set of grill lights - bright and flexible as far as placement on a grill. Of course, they attach to the grill lid itself to cast light downward, but if your grill has side tables made of metal (not aluminum or plastic) as mine does, you can place one light on each table to provide lighting from the sides of the grill. Also, when not being used for grilling, I've attached them to the metal door hinges of an open closet to provide illumination to an unlit space.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and bright
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our grill because we currently have no outside lightening. These have a very strong magnet keeping them very securely attached to the grill. I put them both next to the grill and also on top of the lid and they did not move at all. The light is very bright. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Berish

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my outdoor grill
customer_reviews.text: LED is the way to go, these lights magnetically attach to my grill and provide three times the light over my existing built in bulb in my BBQ grill. They also come with a great case. I put the case in a ziplock bag and place it in my drawer outside by the grill. Bravo, great grill tool!!
customer_reviews.author: HonestlySpeakingDez

customer_reviews.title: Grill lights
customer_reviews.text: My wife got these for me so that I could have some more direct light when I am grilling at night. These work great! They put off a great amount of light and the magnets hold strong on my grill. They came in a nice small weather resistant case that I keep outside in my deck box. I will use these anytime I’m grilling in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: DC 🐧

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these for grilling!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband so he could grill outside now that it's winter. We are in California so we don't get a lot of varying weather but they seem strong and well made. My husband loves them. Even brought them in the kitchen. Easy to use and travel with where light is needed. Magnet is a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Game changing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lights! I had trouble doing overnight cooks because there was little to no light on my grill and using the phone got annoying, but now I can open the grill up with bright LEDs to see my cook progress no problem! Would highly recommend anyone to get if you take bbqing seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Chien Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but magnet doesn’t work on stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Great idea, but the magnet doesn’t work on stainless steel. Isn’t that what almost all BBQs are? I tried to look for info in the description on whether or not the magnet works on stainless steel and I didn’t find any. So I ordered it knowing that it may not work. But I think this should be the first set of information in the description.
customer_reviews.author: sean s.

customer_reviews.title: Love having magnetic lights for my grill
customer_reviews.text: These did the job for the season then I had lights in my back yard installed. Customer service was spot on so order with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Great father's day present!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights for my dad for a father's day present and he loved them! I was worried about the quality of them due to the low price but these exceeded our expectations. The brightness is great and they do not get hot while being on the grill lid. My dad has used these very often and for other handy projects around the house. I highly recommend these and will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Madalynn S.

customer_reviews.title: 2 for the price of 1, best grill lights ever!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are fantastic, bought for our Weber grill so we could see food clearly at night while grilling. Brightness is great & the fact that you can attach the lights but also move them (as long as you have metal for magnet!) makes them so versatile. I bought 2 sets, one for us & 1 set as a Christmas grab bag gift.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: This light works great!
customer_reviews.text: First, I love that the product comes in a case so that I don't have to worry about losing one of the lights and/or damaging them. Second, the lights are very bright - perfect for grilling at night. Third, the products are high quality. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: T1245

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I was given compensation for this review, but it is an honest review still. These lamps are a great addition for my BBQ at night. They do stick well to steel with the magnet on the base. Light is enough to cover most of the grill area. It does get a hot so be careful when touching them. So far I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Eitan Nudel

customer_reviews.title: Brightness and stability for outside cooking.
customer_reviews.text: What not to like. It covers it all as you can tell by the stars. I have tried a couple of different lights for night time Bar B Que or late afternoon to evening smoking and I have to say for the bright light and magnet holding these lights are the best in my book. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence V.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These did not work for me. The need something for the magnets to adhere to. Does not work for My stainless steal grill
customer_reviews.author: Barbara I.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright, strong magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my dad and I to grill. They seem to be quite bright and the magnet is strong enough to hold it horizontally. I appreciate that batteries were included and it has a nice storage case. I would definitely buy again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mcgough III

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Bright
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my fiancé as a Father's Day gift, so he doesn't have to keep the big deck light on attracting bugs when he grills at night. He's pretty excited about them & cant wait to try 'em. He loves how bright & small they are & is already thinking of different uses for 'em. Since they are so bright he's gonna just use 1 for the grill & keep 1 in his truck glovebox. I received lots of Thank Yous for this one...lol
customer_reviews.author: Tbbernie

customer_reviews.title: best grill light ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of grill lights in the past but these are the brightest, easy to use and most versatile I have ever had. Magnets are strong and position the light any way you want it... I have already ordered a second set. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggersman

customer_reviews.title: Good solution for grill light
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. Did get quite hot when mounted on the steel cover of my Weber gas grill. Will it survive over time? I wish the gooseneck were somewhat longer so that the unit could sit on side tables of my grill and still shine into the firebox. Much better than plastic lights I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: I can grill in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with these lights. Nice and bright. I've used them on my Blackstone griddle with a powder-coat top and a stainless CharBroil grill. The magnets work well on both. Oh, and the case is convenient and easy to pack when we go camping. If I can figure out how to post a picture, I will.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights in beautiful waterproof case
customer_reviews.text: These lights you can put on and off in a snap due to the magnetic bottoms, easy asjustbale and bendable. It comes in a nice padded airtight/waterproof case you just hang on the grill knobs all year long. Oh, and I stepped on the case by accident with my full weight, and the case could even handle that!
customer_reviews.author: JBboughtit

customer_reviews.title: Great for barbequing in the Pacific Northwest!
customer_reviews.text: The two pack of these LED lights was great! I set one up on each side of the grill and was able to monitor each side with adequate light. These were a great improvement over the centered overhead light that originally came with my grill. PROS: Excellent range of motion, sleek design, included storage case. CONS: The only drawback I encountered was the magnet base didn't work with the stainless steel end tables on my grill. So not even a design flaw of this product, just something to consider if you have a stainless grill as well. Fortunately, as long as you don't extend the light directly out, the base was heavy enough to keep the light upright.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for my dad for his birthday and he loooves them! i got them for his grill, but he quickly realized that he can use them for more than just that! they came in a convenient case and batteries were included.
customer_reviews.author: kristen parton

customer_reviews.title: Pleased for the price
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used these yet; giving as a gift for Father’s Day. Overall happy with the purchase. Very bright! There is a plastic bag like substance inside one of the lights that I can’t seem to remove under the glass. It does not affect the brightness of the light that I can tell. Hopefully it’s just a small defect. Other than that I love that they come in a small box for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Small lights pack big punch.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grill lights as they are magnetic. They are so much more convenient than clipping them on the grill handle. Super bright lightweight, and can be stored in the convenient carrying case they come with. My only suggestion to the manufacturer would be to make the flexible neck longer to add more flexibility to where the light shines on the grill. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Docimprov

customer_reviews.title: Two for the price of one
customer_reviews.text: GrillLight double pack arrived in a timely manner packed in a cushioned snap shut clam shell case. The lights are very bright, magnetic base is really magnetic and of course the fact that batts were included is always a plus Definitely an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use with my smoker. Cute little light. Wish they were longer but I guess that is my fault that I didn’t pay attention to specs when ordering. Still they get the job done. I like that they are magnetic and come with batteries. They really do help out when I’m cooking in the dark
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great item!!! We are so happy with this purchase and the customer service is remarkable!!! When we received the lights one of the battery compartments was put together incorrectly so we reached out to the company and they responded within 24 hours. They asked me to verify my order and then instead of just replacing the small piece they sent us a whole new set!!!! The lights work great. My husband gas used them while grilling and also used them to light up our outdoor dart board one night. Strongly recommend this item!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights for a grill. I use them on a Blackstone griddle, they stick perfectly to the lid and when open shine light on the cooking surface. I am pleased and would buy them again. They also come with a storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these lights and the handy case they come in. You can use them for so many more things recently lost power for a week and glad I had them very bright the battery life was long and a great pric.if you need a bright durable flashlight these are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hemibear

customer_reviews.title: Works good and is bright enough to use only one if you have multiple grills
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband who seems to always be grilling late night meals and can’t see a thing lol. He was very excited to use them. It was bright enough for him to see his whole grill with only one light, and the heat from the grill didn’t seem to effect it at all. It’s awesome it came with 2 lights since we have 2 different grills. He also has smokers so we may be ordering more to put above those on our metal shed :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the grill at our cabin. We are in the middle of the woods and do not want to turn yard lights on when cooking at night, for fear of attracting too many mosquitos. These lights are perfect. And my hubby can angle them towards the cabin so he can find his way to the porch.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN N.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These lights seem to be high quality and very strong. The magnetics are strong enough to keep them held up sideways. The stem neck is super malleable. The lights seem bright. The value for the price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Source For My Grill
customer_reviews.text: The KOSIN Barbecue Grill Light with Magnetic Base and Super-Bright LED BBQ Lights is great. There is no light where my grill fits on the patio. The Kosin Light shines brightly onto my grill and with the magnetic base, I can put it where I need it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: AmerTrav

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They weren’t particularly for me but for my fiancé! He grills a lot and with us both working on nights, we are always cooking way past dark. These lights are small so they don’t get in they way but are mighty when it comes to providing visibility. These have magnetic bottoms so you can but them anywhere and a snake neck to help you angle the light just right. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dill

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little smaller than I expected, but a LOT brighter so all is good. Having 2 separate lights is great. We accidentally left one on overnight and because of the LED's using so little power, it was fine. The magnetic base is plenty strong and they seem very weatherproof so far. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KOSIN Barbecue Grill Light Magnetic Base Super-Bright LED BBQ Lights - 360 Degree Flexible Gooseneck, Weather Resistant, Batteries Included - Pack of 2
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackAre you in the DARK about grilling? Ever spoiled your good meat when night comes during a grilling session? This Barbecue Grill Light provides a perfect solution for this situation. With 9 PCS Ultra Bright LEDs, it becomes easy to see everything when you BBQ at night. It will light up your cooking area perfectly with its wide, bright beam.

Features:
-- 9 very bright LEDs that can illuminate your grill area throughout the night. They do not go off.
-- Made from durable, heat-resistant aluminum alloy. This torch cannot be destroyed by heat. It can stay under high heat for long. It is water resistant so it can resist rain and snow.
-- Magnetic base makes it very easy to install (no tools required). It fits most grills (as long as they are magnetic, most grills are metallic).
-- Adjustable swivel head, this torch is easily used in the garage or workshop when night falls. It lights up your working area for easy working.
-- Touch sensor switch, it is made to easily turn on or off by just a slight touch.
-- Up to 20 continuous hour lifespan with 3 PCS AAA battery.

Specifications: 
Gooseneck Length: 4.33inch
Package Weight: 0.58 lbs
Material: Aluminum Alloy
Batteries: 3 AAA batteries required (INCLUDED)
LED lights: 9 LEDs with 100,000 hours lifespan

Package Includes: 
2*BBQ Grill Lights
1*Plastic Protective & Reusable Case
6*AAA Batteries
feature_bullets: [Super Bright]The BBQ light features 9 high-density LEDs. It provides a super bright and glare-free, wide light beam to illuminate your cooking area so that you do not have any problems cooking at any time of the day.

[Powerful Magnetic Base and Flexible Gooseneck]This feature allows you to easily mount your torch without any installation tools or technicalities. As long as your grill is made of a magnetic material. The gooseneck is made up of a flexible material and can adjust 360 degrees. The gooseneck is 4.5 inches allowing you to project the light where you want.

[water resistance and durability]The material making this torch is an aluminum alloy, it is resistant to extremely hot weather conditions. It is water resistance nature allows you to use it during rainy and snow seasons.

[Portable and Multi-Purpose]The light is not fixed in one place. When not using it at the BBQ you can use it to light other things. It can be used for biking, camping, reading and any other things you would want to do at night. Mechanics and craftsmen can also use it.

[Batteries Included and After-Sales]Our products are equipped with 6 durable AAA batteries so you don't need to buy another battery at the beginning. This will save you cost, time and effort. If it doesn't work out for you for any reason please contact us at the first time. We will always be here to help you solve your problem.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,829 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
